name: Into the Darkness (Rona Hattingh)
description:
After the war with the Spinae, Dark City enters a period of quiet and peace, but a new enemy lurks in the darkness of the city. Waiting for its time to arrive.

Aida, elemental in the defeat of the Spinae, feels an unease creeping into her mind. When the Beggar disappears,  she decides to investigate and what she discovers makes the blood freeze in her veins.

HOW TO PLAY?

Movement - WASD

Run - LEFT SHIFT

Jump - SPACE

Shoot - LEFT MOUSE

WEAPON PICKUPS

CREDITS:

Thank you to every artist who made this game possible.

TO THE PLAYER...

Thank you for playing my game, hope you enjoy it!

Lots of love. 

Rona Hattingh
